snippet: The layoffs are the latest sign of the bookseller’s challenges in carrying out its digital strategy.
abstract: Barnes & Noble lays off less than 100 people in its Nook device unit, latest sign of company's difficulties in executing its digital strategy.
lead_paragraph: The layoffs are the latest sign of the bookseller’s challenges in carrying out its digital strategy.

headline.main: Bookseller Cuts Jobs at Division for Nook
headline.print_headline: Bookseller Cuts Jobs at Division for Nook
